project1.title: Machine Learning for Computational Drug Discovery
project1.description: A comprehensive machine learning workflow for computational drug discovery using ChEMBL data, applying ML techniques to predict bioactivity of chemical compounds.

project2.title: Bioactivity Prediction App for Acetylcholinesterase
project2.description: Web application for predicting bioactivity of chemical compounds against Acetylcholinesterase, a key drug target for Alzheimer's disease treatment.

project3.title: InsightFlow: Online Retail Data Pipeline
project3.description: End-to-end data engineering pipeline for processing and analyzing online retail data with automated quality checks.

project4.title: Coffee Shop Sales Analytics Dashboard
project4.description: A comprehensive Excel-based analytics dashboard for coffee shop sales data with multi-dimensional analysis and visualization.
features: Hourly sales patterns with interactive filtering

project5.title: DevOps Pipeline for Spring Boot
project5.description: Robust CI/CD pipeline for automating build, test, and deployment processes for Spring Boot applications.

project6.title: World Development Indicators Dashboard
project6.description: Business intelligence dashboard analyzing sustainable development indicators and COVID-19 impacts across multiple dimensions.

project7.title: Dynamics CRM for Real Estate
project7.description: Custom CRM solution for real estate management with automated workflows and business process flows.

project8.title: BCG Data Science Job Simulation
project8.description: Completed a customer churn analysis simulation, demonstrating advanced data analytics skills and achieving an 85% accuracy rate in predicting customer churn.

exp1.title: Software Quality Assurance Engineer & Business Analyst
highlights: Projects: Uvey (AI Accounting & Finance SaaS) | Deepnrise (Industry 4.0 QRQC) | Rektic (AI SEO & Content Generation)
Owned QA activities across multiple SaaS products, ensuring quality, data accuracy, and release stability.

Validated AI-powered accounting workflows enabling invoice and bank statement upload, OCR extraction, automated transaction classification, and AI-based invoice-to-transaction matching with human validation.
Translated accounting and business requirements into functional specifications, user stories, and acceptance criteria.
Designed and executed risk-based functional, regression, and integration tests for finance-critical workflows.
Built and maintained 50+ Playwright automated tests, integrated into GitLab CI/CD pipelines.
Performed API testing and data validation to ensure consistency between AI services, accounting rules, and reporting outputs.
Reduced defect resolution time by 30% through improved defect tracking and prioritization.
Analyzed logs using Kibana and Elasticsearch to identify root causes and prevent recurring issues.
Built QA dashboards tracking test execution, defect trends, and quality KPIs to support release decisions.
Supported UAT, documentation, and end-user training in Agile delivery cycles.

exp2.title: Business Intelligence engineer
highlights: Design fraud detection and risk analysis dashboards (BigQuery, Looker), improving decision-making efficiency by 30%.
Implement ETL pipelines using Apache Airflow and dbt, increasing data integration efficiency by 40%.
Develop reusable data models and defined KPIs to support finance and risk monitoring.
Automate reconciliation processes, reducing data processing time by 25%.

exp3.title: Software Quality Assurance Analyst Intern
highlights: Executed 150+ manual and automated test cases, maintaining a 95% quality compliance rate.
Documented defects and test results, contributing to a 25% reduction in bug-fix turnaround time.
Collaborated with developers on debugging and validation across Quarkus (backend) and Angular (frontend) applications.
